notes: Spawned while facing [[The Blazing Time Guardian]] during the [[Forgotten Knowledge Quest]].
name: Time Waster
location: Deep below north-west of [[Edron]], {{Mapper Coords|128.209|123.175|14|2|text=here}} (accessible through the [[Astral Shaper Dungeon]] behind the [[Holy Portal]]).
strategy: Upon using [[Lost Time (Item)]] on it, you'll get the following message {{Server Message|The time waster hungrily consumes the time and vanishes}} and it will disappear.
